atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, and utilities styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use @layer to tell Tailwind which layer a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Generate variants of utilities by wrapping their definitions in the @variants directive

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: Generate responsive variants of utilities by wrapping their definitions in the @responsive directive

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: Create media queries that reference your breakpoints by name instead of duplicating their values
